documentation.title: TreeNode Class [Javascript]
documentation.metadescription: KoolTreeView is the excellent treeview control for PHP, combining highly-efficient rendering and AJAX Load on Demand support for superior performance.
documentation.metakeywords: php treeview, php tree view, php tree, ajax treeview, php ajax treeview

method.name: getText
method.shortdesc: Get a node text content.
method.longdesc: Get a node text content.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // Get content of "software" node
        var content = kTree.getNode("software").getText();
    }
</script>

method.name: setText
method.shortdesc: Get a node text content.
method.longdesc: Get a node text content.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // Set content to "software" node
        kTree.getNode("software").setText("My software");
    }
</script>

method.name: getImageSrc
method.shortdesc: Get src of image in a node.
method.longdesc: Get src of image in a node.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // Get content of "software" node
        var src = kTree.getNode("software").getImageSrc();
    }
</script>

method.name: setImageSrc
method.shortdesc: Set src to the image of a node.
method.longdesc: Set src to the image of a node.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // Set content to "software" node
        kTree.getNode("software").setImageSrc("images/folder.gif");
    }
</script>

method.name: getData
method.shortdesc: Get node attached data.
method.longdesc: Get node attached data.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // Get data of "software" node
        var data = kTree.getNode("software").getData("name");
    }
</script>

method.name: addData
method.shortdesc: Add data to a node
method.longdesc: Add data to the node. Simply providing the key and the value, the data will be saved and retrieve later by getData function.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // Get data of "software" node
        var data = kTree.getNode("software").addData("name","John");
		alert(kTree.getNode("software").getData("name"));
    }
</script>

method.name: getTree
method.shortdesc: Get tree object of the node.
method.longdesc: Get tree object of the node.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // Get the tree of the node
        var tree = node.getTree();
    }
</script>

method.name: moveToAbove
method.shortdesc: Move the node to above a node.
method.longdesc: Move the node to above a node.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // Move "software" node above "hardware" node.
        kTree.getNode("software").moveToAbove("hardware");
    }
</script>

method.name: moveToBelow
method.shortdesc: Move the node to above a node.
method.longdesc: Move the node to above a node.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // Move "software" node bellow "hardware" node.
        kTree.getNode("software").moveToBelow("hardware");
    }
</script>

method.name: isSelected
method.shortdesc: Check whether the node is selected
method.longdesc: Check whether the node is selected
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        if (kTree.getNode("software").isSelected()==true)
        {
            alert("Software node is selected");
        }
    }
</script>

method.name: isExpanded
method.shortdesc: Check whether the node is expanded
method.longdesc: Check whether the node is expanded
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        if (kTree.getNode("software").isExpanded()==true)
        {
            alert("Software node is expanded");
        }
    }
</script>

method.name: startEdit
method.shortdesc: Start editing the node.
method.longdesc: Start editing the node. If the initContent is specified, the node will be started edit with initContent string.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Make "software" node start editing.
        kTree.getNode("software").startEdit();
    }
</script>

method.name: endEdit
method.shortdesc: End editing the node.
method.longdesc: End editing the node, if the updated is true, content will be updated. If updated is false, update node content will be cancelled
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //End editing action and update the node content.
        kTree.getNode("software").endEdit(true);
    }
</script>

method.name: expand
method.shortdesc: Expand a node
method.longdesc: Expand a node
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function testTreeView()
    {
        // Expand the "software" node
        kTree.getNode("software").expand();
    }
</script>

method.name: collapse
method.shortdesc: Collapse a node
method.longdesc: Collapse a node
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // Collapse the "software" node
        kTree.getNode("software").collapse();
    }
</script>

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Select a node
method.longdesc: Select a node
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // Select the "software" node
        kTree.getNode("software").select();
    }
</script>

method.name: unselect
method.shortdesc: Unselect a node
method.longdesc: Unselect a node
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // unselect the "software" node
        kTree.getNode("software").unselect();
    }
</script>

method.name: getParentId
method.shortdesc: Return the parent id of a node
method.longdesc: Return the parent id of a node
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function testTreeView()
    {
        //Get the id of parent node of the "software" node
        var parentid = kTree.getNode("software").getParenId();
    }
</script>

method.name: getChildIds
method.shortdesc: Return array of child ids of a node.
method.longdesc: Return array of child ids of a node.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        // Return all child id under node "node1"
        var childList = kTree.getNode("software").getChildIds();
        for(var i=0;i<childList.length;i++)
        {
            alert(childList[i]);	
        }
    }
</script>

method.name: attachTo
method.shortdesc: Attach this node to another node
method.longdesc: Attach this node to another node
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        kTree.getNode("software").attachTo("computer");
    }
</script>

method.name: loadSubTree
method.shortdesc: Load a subtree to node.
method.longdesc: Load a subtree to node.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Dynamic load subtree for "software" node
        kTree.getNode("software").loadSubTree("subtree.php");
    }
</script>

method.name: disableSelect
method.shortdesc: Set whether a node is select-disable. Collapse
method.longdesc: Set whether a node is select-disable. Collapse
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Disable the selection for "software" node
        kTree.getNode("software").disableSelect(true);
    }
</script>

method.name: disableDrag
method.shortdesc: Set whether a node is select-disable.
method.longdesc: Set whether a node is select-disable.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Disable the dragging for "software" node
        kTree.getNode("software").disableDrag(true);
    }
</script>

method.name: disableDrop
method.shortdesc: Set whether a node is select-disable.
method.longdesc: Set whether a node is select-disable.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Disable the dropping for "software" node
        kTree.getNode("software").disableDrop(true);
    }
</script>

method.name: disableEdit
method.shortdesc: Set whether a node is select-disable.
method.longdesc: Set whether a node is select-disable.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Disable the editing for "software" node
        kTree.getNode("software").disableEdit(true);
    }
</script>

method.name: addChildNode
method.shortdesc: Add a new sub node to this node.
method.longdesc: Add a new sub node to this node.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Add a new subnode "Window Vista" to current  "software" node
        kTree.getNode("software").addChildNode("win","Window Vista","images/vista.gif");
    }
</script>
